gr.agroscape.dataLoaders

Interface ISimulationDataLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDataLoader, ExcelDataLoader

    public interface ISimulationDataLoader
    The interface, defining what is needed to load data and initialize Agroscape.
    See DefaultDataLoader.
    Author:
    Dimitris Kremmydas
